help-file.title: "REVEAL TRUE NAME"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <object> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Divination
"Reveal True Name" gleans the true name of an object that just might be deceiving you. As an example, many potions you might find are not very forthright about what they actually do. This spell might reveal a more detailed name, thus telling you more about it's purpose.
